notesStmt.note: Folio 2 and 58-59 is mutilated. Imperfect at the beginning and at the end. Slightly wotm-eaten. Stained.

Folios 60r-61v: two fragments of the same work by another hand. The contents of folio 60 coincide with those on folio 42v to 44r.Partially illegible owners' entries in Arabic cursive, on a strip of paper, folio 1r, 1v - written by the same hand as folios 2-59.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
